patthana1.10:1.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana1.10:42.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati aññamaññapaccayā, nissayapaccayā, upanissayapaccayā, purejātapaccayā, āsevanapaccayā, kammapaccayā, vipākapaccayā, āhārapaccayā, indriyapaccayā, jhānapaccayā, maggapaccayā, sampayuttapaccayā, vippayuttapaccayā, atthipaccayā, natthipaccayā, vigatapaccayā, avigatapaccayā.
patthana1.10:43.1_0: Hetuyā sattarasa, ārammaṇe ekādasa, adhipatiyā nava, anantare ekādasa, samanantare ekādasa, sahajāte sattarasa, aññamaññe ekādasa, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye ekādasa, purejāte ekādasa, āsevane ekādasa, kamme sattarasa, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre sattarasa, indriye sattarasa, jhāne sattarasa, magge sattarasa, sampayutte ekādasa, vippayutte sattarasa, atthiyā sattarasa, natthiyā ekādasa, vigate ekādasa, avigate sattarasa.

patthana1.10:124.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukañca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ paccayā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā— bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe… tīṇi …
patthana1.10:125.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati sahajātapaccayā—dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā …pe….
patthana1.10:126.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati sahajātapaccayā—dassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana1.10:126.1_1: vicikicchāsahagate khandhe paccayā vicikicchāsahagato moho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ.
patthana1.10:127.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti sahajātapaccayā—dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.10:127.1_1: vicikicchāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā moho ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.10:128.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Dassanena sadisā.)
patthana1.10:129.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati sahajātapaccayā—nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.10:129.1_1: vicikicchāsahagataṁ uddhaccasahagataṁ mohaṁ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.10:129.1_3: khandhe paccayā vatthu, vatthuṁ paccayā khandhā;
patthana1.10:129.1_8: vatthuṁ paccayā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā khandhā.
patthana1.10:130.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati sahajātapaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā;
patthana1.10:131.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati sahajātapaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā khandhā;
patthana1.10:132.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti sahajātapaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā;
patthana1.10:132.1_2: vicikicchāsahagataṁ mohaṁ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana1.10:132.1_3: vatthuṁ paccayā vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca.
patthana1.10:133.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti sahajātapaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā khandhā;
patthana1.10:133.1_2: uddhaccasahagataṁ mohaṁ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana1.10:133.1_3: vatthuṁ paccayā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca.
patthana1.10:134.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati sahajātapaccayā— dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.10:134.1_1: vicikicchāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca mohañca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe….
patthana1.10:135.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ paccayā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati sahajātapaccayā—dassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana1.10:135.1_1: vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca mohañca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana1.10:135.1_2: vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato moho.

patthana1.10:136.1_2: dassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana1.10:136.1_3: vicikicchāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca mohañca paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.10:136.1_5: vicikicchāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā moho ca …pe…
patthana1.10:136.1_6: dve khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā moho ca.
patthana1.10:137.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukañca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ paccayā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati sahajātapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana1.10:138.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati aññamaññapaccayā …
patthana1.10:139.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati vippayuttapaccayā—dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.10:140.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati vippayuttapaccayā—dassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, khandhe vippayuttapaccayā.
patthana1.10:140.1_1: Vicikicchāsahagate khandhe paccayā moho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, moho vatthuṁ vippayuttapaccayā.
patthana1.10:141.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti vippayuttapaccayā—dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.10:141.1_4: Vicikicchāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā moho ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.10:141.1_6: khandhā ca moho ca vatthuṁ vippayuttapaccayā.
patthana1.10:142.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati vippayuttapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana1.10:143.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati vippayuttapaccayā—nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …
patthana1.10:143.1_4: Vicikicchāsahagataṁ uddhaccasahagataṁ mohaṁ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, mohaṁ vippayuttapaccayā.
patthana1.10:143.1_6: khandhe paccayā vatthu, vatthuṁ paccayā khandhā.
patthana1.10:143.1_10: mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ, khandhe vippayuttapaccayā.
patthana1.10:143.1_13: vatthuṁ paccayā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā khandhā.
patthana1.10:144.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati vippayuttapaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā, vatthuṁ vippayuttapaccayā.
patthana1.10:144.1_1: Vicikicchāsahagataṁ mohaṁ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā, vatthuṁ vippayuttapaccayā.

patthana1.10:146.1_1: mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, khandhā vatthuṁ vippayuttapaccayā.
patthana1.10:146.1_3: Vicikicchāsahagataṁ mohaṁ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, khandhā vatthuṁ vippayuttapaccayā.
patthana1.10:146.1_5: Vatthuṁ paccayā vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca, vatthuṁ vippayuttapaccayā.

patthana1.10:148.1_3: Vicikicchāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca mohañca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana1.10:149.1_2: Vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato moho, vatthuṁ vippayuttapaccayā.

patthana1.10:150.1_7: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, khandhe ca mohañca vippayuttapaccayā.

patthana1.10:153.1_0: Hetuyā sattarasa, ārammaṇe sattarasa, adhipatiyā sattarasa, anantare sattarasa, samanantare sattarasa, sahajāte sattarasa, aññamaññe sattarasa nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye sattarasa, purejāte sattarasa, āsevane sattarasa, kamme sattarasa, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre sattarasa, indriye sattarasa, jhāne sattarasa, magge sattarasa, sampayutte sattarasa, vippayutte sattarasa, atthiyā sattarasa, natthiyā sattarasa, vigate sattarasa, avigate sattarasa.
patthana1.10:155.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate khandhe paccayā vicikicchāsahagato moho.
patthana1.10:156.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—uddhaccasahagate khandhe paccayā uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.10:157.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.10:157.1_3: vatthuṁ paccayā ahetukā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā khandhā;
patthana1.10:158.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ paccayā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato moho.
patthana1.10:159.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukañca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ paccayā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.10:160.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—dassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.10:161.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke khandhe paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.10:162.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke khandhe paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.

patthana1.10:163.1_1: vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca mohañca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.10:164.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukañca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ paccayā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana1.10:164.1_1: uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca mohañca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.10:165.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā (sahajātasadisaṁ) …
patthana1.10:166.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—dassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetukā cetanā.
patthana1.10:167.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke khandhe paccayā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā cetanā.
patthana1.10:168.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke khandhe paccayā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā cetanā;
patthana1.10:168.1_4: vatthuṁ paccayā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā cetanā.
patthana1.10:169.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetukā cetanā;
patthana1.10:170.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā cetanā;
patthana1.10:171.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— dassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetukā cetanā;
patthana1.10:171.1_1: vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca mohañca paccayā sampayuttakā cetanā.
patthana1.10:172.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukañca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ paccayā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā cetanā;
patthana1.10:172.1_1: uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca mohañca paccayā sampayuttakā cetanā.

patthana1.10:174.1_0: Nahetuyā pañca, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā sattarasa, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte terasa, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane sattarasa, nakamme satta, navipāke sattarasa, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte ekādasa, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.10:176.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā sattarasa, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte terasa, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane sattarasa, nakamme satta, navipāke sattarasa, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte ekādasa, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.10:178.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe pañca, anantare pañca, samanantare pañca, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe pañca, nissaye pañca, upanissaye pañca, purejāte pañca, āsevane pañca, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre pañca, indriye pañca, jhāne pañca, magge pañca, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca, natthiyā pañca, vigate pañca, avigate pañca.

patthana1.10:182.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.10:183.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana1.10:186.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— vicikicchāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca mohañca saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.10:187.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukañca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— uddhaccasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca mohañca saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.10:188.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.10:189.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate khandhe saṁsaṭṭho vicikicchāsahagato moho.
patthana1.10:190.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—vicikicchāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā moho ca …pe…
patthana1.10:192.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana1.10:194.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—uddhaccasahagataṁ mohaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā sampayuttakā khandhā.
patthana1.10:195.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— vicikicchāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca mohañca saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.10:195.1_1: dve khandhe ca mohañca saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā.
patthana1.10:196.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukañca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— uddhaccasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca mohañca saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana1.10:199.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā—nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.10:200.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati sahajātapaccayā …
patthana1.10:201.1_0: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe ekādasa, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare ekādasa, samanantare ekādasa, sahajāte ekādasa, aññamaññe ekādasa, nissaye ekādasa, upanissaye ekādasa, purejāte ekādasa, āsevane ekādasa, kamme ekādasa, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre ekādasa, indriye ekādasa, jhāne ekādasa, magge ekādasa, sampayutte ekādasa, vippayutte ekādasa, atthiyā ekādasa, natthiyā ekādasa, vigate ekādasa, avigate ekādasa.
patthana1.10:203.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate khandhe saṁsaṭṭho vicikicchāsahagato moho.
patthana1.10:204.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—uddhaccasahagate khandhe saṁsaṭṭho uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.10:205.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.10:207.1_0: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā ekādasa, napurejāte ekādasa, napacchājāte ekādasa, naāsevane ekādasa, nakamme satta, navipāke ekādasa, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, navippayutte ekādasa.
patthana1.10:209.1_0: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā satta, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte satta, naāsevane satta, nakamme satta, navipāke satta, navippayutte satta.
patthana1.10:211.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge dve, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate tīṇi, avigate tīṇi.
patthana1.10:214.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—dassanena pahātabbahetukā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:215.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—dassanena pahātabbahetukā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:216.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—dassanena pahātabbahetukā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:218.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo …pe….
patthana1.10:219.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—vicikicchāsahagato moho sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:220.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—uddhaccasahagato moho sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:221.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—vicikicchāsahagato moho sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:222.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—uddhaccasahagato moho sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:223.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ rāgaṁ assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.10:223.1_1: taṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.10:223.1_3: taṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.10:223.1_4: Vicikicchaṁ ārabbha vicikicchā uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.10:223.1_5: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ domanassaṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati.
patthana1.10:224.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā dassanena pahātabbahetuke pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti, dassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe aniccato …pe…
patthana1.10:224.1_2: dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya mohassa ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:225.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— dassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe ārabbha vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.
patthana1.10:226.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ rāgaṁ assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.10:226.1_1: taṁ ārabbha bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ uppajjati, bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.10:226.1_2: Uddhaccaṁ ārabbha uddhaccaṁ uppajjati, bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.10:226.1_3: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ domanassaṁ ārabbha bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.10:227.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ rāgaṁ assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.10:227.1_1: taṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.10:227.1_2: Uddhaccaṁ ārabbha diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.10:227.1_3: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ domanassaṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati.
patthana1.10:228.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti, bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke khandhe aniccato …pe…
patthana1.10:228.1_2: bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya mohassa ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.10:230.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke khandhe ārabbha uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.
patthana1.10:231.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā …

patthana1.10:233.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā ….
patthana1.10:234.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—cakkhuṁ ārabbha vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.

patthana1.10:235.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—cakkhuṁ …pe…
patthana1.10:235.1_2: nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke khandhe ārabbha uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.
patthana1.10:236.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca mohañca ārabbha dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana1.10:237.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca mohañca ārabbha nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.
patthana1.10:238.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca mohañca ārabbha vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.

patthana1.10:292.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ dassanena pahātabbahetukānaṁ khandhānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:293.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā pacchimassa pacchimassa mohassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:294.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ vicikicchāsahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ mohassa ca āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:295.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa (saṅkhittaṁ) tīṇi.
patthana1.10:296.1_1: (Āsevanamūlake vuṭṭhānassapi āvajjanāyapi pahātabbaṁ, sattarasa pañhā paripuṇṇā, anantarasadisā.)
patthana1.10:297.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—dassanena pahātabbahetukā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:298.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.10:298.1_1: **Sahajātā**—dassanena pahātabbahetukā cetanā mohassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:298.1_2: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—dassanena pahātabbahetukā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:299.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—dassanena pahātabbahetukā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ mohassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:300.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:301.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā cetanā mohassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.10:304.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo (pavattipaṭisandhi) vipākā khandhā vatthussa …pe….
patthana1.10:305.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—dassanena pahātabbahetukā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:306.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—dassanena pahātabbahetukā āhārā mohassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:307.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—dassanena pahātabbahetukā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ mohassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:309.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:310.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana1.10:312.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana1.10:313.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.10:314.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.10:315.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.10:315.1_1: (Dassanattikasadisaṁ.) **Pacchājātā**—nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā khandhā ca moho ca purejātassa imassa kāyassa …pe….
patthana1.10:316.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:317.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:318.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:318.1_1: **Purejātaṁ**—vatthu vicikicchāsahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ mohassa ca vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:319.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:319.1_1: **Purejātaṁ**—vatthu uddhaccasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ mohassa ca vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.10:320.1_2: **Pacchājātā**—vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.10:323.1_1: **Sahajātā**—dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:323.1_2: **Sahajātā**—vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā mohassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:323.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:324.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—dassanena pahātabbahetuko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:324.1_1: Vicikicchāsahagato eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ mohassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe….
patthana1.10:326.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.

patthana1.10:327.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.10:327.1_4: taṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati, vatthu dassanena pahātabbahetukānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.10:328.1_4: vatthu bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:329.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.

patthana1.10:345.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.10:346.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.10:347.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.10:348.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.10:349.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.10:350.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.10:351.1_0: (Idha sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, missagataṁ atthi, pāḷiyaṁ kātabbaṁ. Gaṇanāya upadhāretvā gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.10:352.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.10:353.1_0: (Idhāpi ārammaṇapaccayā upanissayapaccayā atthi, pāḷiyaṁ natthi. Gaṇentena upadhāretvā gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.10:354.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.10:355.1_0: (Idhāpi “sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ” yaṁ missakapañhā atthi, pāḷiyaṁ kātabbaṁ.)
patthana1.10:356.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.10:357.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.10:358.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.10:359.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.10:360.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.10:361.1_1: Ye te pañhā na likhitā, te pāḷiyaṁ gaṇentānaṁ byañjanena na samenti.
patthana1.10:361.1_2: Te pāḷiyaṁ na likhitā gaṇanā pākaṭā honti.
patthana1.10:361.1_3: Yadi saṁsayo uppajjati, anulome atthipaccaye pekkhitabbaṁ.)
patthana1.10:362.1_0: Nahetuyā ekavīsa, naārammaṇe naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare nasahajāte naaññamaññe nanissaye naupanissaye napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge nasampayutte navippayutte noatthiyā nonatthiyā novigate noavigate sabbattha ekavīsa.
patthana1.10:364.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe ekādasa, naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare ekādasa, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge ekādasa, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte pañca, nonatthiyā ekādasa, novigate ekādasa.
patthana1.10:366.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekavīsa, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare sattarasa, samanantare sattarasa, sahajāte sattarasa, aññamaññe ekādasa, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye ekavīsa, purejāte pañca, pacchājāte pañca, āsevane sattarasa, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte ekādasa, vippayutte nava, atthiyā sattarasa, natthiyā sattarasa, vigate sattarasa, avigate sattarasa.
